channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for OR
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for OR

item.title: Report X-2024010526
item.description:
Report X-2024010526

Identified by scraper @ 2024-01-29T15:11:25+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-01-15
  • City: PORTLAND
  • State: OR
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE CO
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: RESPONDER WAS NOTIFIED OF A LEAKING HAZMAT ON THE IRREG BELT NEAR DOOR 15. UNLOADER PULLED IT OFF THE BELT WHERE HE SAW IT WAS LEAKING. RESPONDER DONNED THE APPROPRIATE PPE ON THE DECISION TREE AND RESPONDED TO THE CALL.

item.title: Report X-2024010591
item.description:
Report X-2024010591

Identified by scraper @ 2024-01-25T15:11:44+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-01-16
  • City: HILLSBORO
  • State: OR
  • Report Type: Undeclared Shipment with no Release
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE CO
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: PACKAGE WAS BROUGHT TO PSC BY BACKUP RESPONDER WHO WORKS IN SMALL SORT DURING THE SHIFT. HE NOTICED A CORNER OF THE BOX WAS SOFT AND WET. RESPONDER NOTICED THE SHIPPER WAS A MANUFACTURER OF HAIR PRODUCTS SO RESPONDER INSPECTED THE BOX TO MAKE SURE THERE WASN'T A SLOW LEAKER OR A DEFROSTING LEAKER INSIDE. RESPONDER DISCOVERED THE AEROSOL CAN, CHECKED THE SDS AND FOUND IT SHOULD HAVE HAD A LIMITED QUANTITY STICKER. RESPONDER CALLED THE HMSC TO CONFIRM.

item.title: Report X-2024010389
item.description:
Report X-2024010389

Identified by scraper @ 2024-01-24T15:11:38+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-01-04
  • City: PORTLAND
  • State: OR
  • Report Type: Undeclared Shipment with no Release
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE CO
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: RESPONDER RESPONDED TO PACKAGE DURING SHIFT AND DISCOVERED IN THIS PACKAGE THAT THERE IS AN AEROSOL INCLUDED IN THIS PACKAGE AND THERE IS NO OUTER MARKINGS. DAMAGE INSPECTION; NON HAZARDOUS SOAP LEAKED; NO LEAK TO AEROSOL. AEROSOLS ARE UNDECLARED.

Report X-2024010387

  • City: PORTLAND

  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE CO
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: RESPONDER FOLLOWED DECISION TREE FOR RESPONDING TO LEAKED ON PACKAGES. DURING DAMAGE INSPECTION SUSPECTED UNDECLAERD (LEAKED ON; NO DAMAGE) AND NOTIFIED RMP. PHOTOS TAKEN PACKAGE HELD FOR ADG COMPLIANCE.

item.title: Report X-2024010423
item.description:
Report X-2024010423

Identified by scraper @ 2024-01-23T15:11:55+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-01-09
  • City: PORTLAND
  • State: OR
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE CO
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: FIBERBOARD BOX WAS DISCOVERED IN THE SORT AISLE ON THE BELT BY THE SORTER. RESPONDER DISCOVERED WET OUTER PACKAGING. RESPONDER FOLLOWED THE PROPER PROCEDURES AND DISCOVERED A FIBERBOARD BOX CONTAINING A BATTERY THAT APPEARED TO BE LEAKING FROM THE TERMINAL CAPS. THE BATTERY WAS DISPOSED OF VIA THE FACILTY WASTE PROCESS.

item.title: Report X-2024010518
item.description:
Report X-2024010518

Identified by scraper @ 2024-01-23T15:11:55+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-01-09
  • City: PORTLAND
  • State: OR
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE CO
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: LEAKING BOX AT LV PICKOFF STATION REPORTED TO PSC BY PD-4. RESPONDER BROUGHT BOX BACK TO PSC. INSIDE WERE 2 BIC LIGHTERS AND AN 80% ALCOHOL BOTTLE OF PERFECT ADVANCED HAND SANITIZER (THE LEAKER) PGIII UN1170 ETHYL ALCOHOL. DUE TO NO HAZMAT WARNING STICKERS ON BOX, RESPONDERNOTIFIED SUPERVISOR AND STARTED UPS UNDECLARED HAZMAT PROCESS.
